name: Eustress Engine
description: Eustress is a complete ecosystem for creating, sharing, and playing interactive 3D experiences. Built from the ground up in 100% Rust, we deliver unprecedented performance, memory safety, and developer experience—all while remaining free forever.

offers.description: Free forever. Premium subscriptions available for enhanced features.

products.name: Eustress Engine
products.description: Professional-grade game engine and creation suite. Build stunning 3D worlds, script gameplay logic with Soul, design UI, and publish to multiple platforms—all from one tool.

products.name: Eustress Player
products.description: Discover and play thousands of community-created experiences. Jump into games instantly through Steam, connect with friends, and explore endless creativity.
